prereq.p: Ensure that you have an active account in MyPack portal and log into it before proceeding with the task

context.p: NC State Unity account can be used to access your personal, academic, and financial information in the MyPack portal

step.cmd: Select Addresses from the left-hand navigation menu

ul.li: Personal Details(Student ID, Name, and Preferred Name)
Veterans Information(Military Affliations, Request Benefits Certification, Review Benefits Requests)

postreq.p: OIS Compliance information is available for International students only
